fields.role: Provides vertical scouting and resets via Skyward Dive; anchors height control.
fields.lead_when: When you have altitude advantage and can initiate with Skyward Dive.
fields.follow_when: When teammates need height for rotation or safe disengage.
fields.disengage_when: When rings pull you into tight spaces or you lack cover.

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with ult; otherwise hold and wait for rotation.

ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies already have high ground advantage.
ultimate.abort_conditions: Ring forces you into enclosed area before you can dive.

fight_flow.start: Enter from height, scan, and set up Skyward Dive.
fight_flow.mid_fight: Use jetpack for repositioning, keep vision on enemies.
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to escape or reset ring pull.

rotations.mid_game: Rotate early to new high ground, avoid being boxed.
rotations.late_game: Use Skyward Dive to escape end‑game chaos.
rotations.bad_rotation: Staying low without an exit plan.

common_mistakes: Hovering in open air too long
Using ult after you’re already boxed
Ignoring ring pull until too late
fields.mental_rule: If unsure → ult out. Preserve height advantage.
